contents.item: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie.
I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university.
If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there
The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living.
contents.owner: Jonathan Safran Foer, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

contents.item: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
These woods are lovely, dark and deep,But I have promises to keep,And miles to go before I sleep,And miles to go before I sleep.
contents.owner: Robert Frost, Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening

contents.item: Get busy living or get busy dying.
Of all sad words of tongue or pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.
contents.owner: John Greenleaf Whittier, Maud Muller - Pamphlet

contents.item: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.

My experience of life is that it is not divided up into genres; it’s a horrifying, romantic, tragic, comical, science-fiction cowboy detective novel. You know, with a bit of pornography if you're lucky.
People aren't either wicked or noble. They're like chef's salads, with good things and bad things chopped and mixed together in a vinaigrette of confusion and conflict.
Life is pain, highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something.
contents.owner: William Goldman, William Goldman: Four Screenplays with Essays

contents.item: Albus Severus," Harry said quietly, so that nobody but Ginny could hear, and she was tactful enough to pretend to be waving to Rose, who was now on the train, "you were named for two headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin and he was probably the bravest man I ever knew.
contents.owner: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

contents.item: A woman has to live her life, or live to repent not having lived it.
Life is to be enjoyed, not endured
The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
Don't take life too seriously. Punch it in the face when it needs a good hit. Laugh at it.
This is your life and its ending one moment at a time.
